rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a welcoming reception area.
Spacious living room with access to the balcony.
Adjacent to the living room for family meals.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony.
Secondary bedroom with its own balcony for privacy and Vastu compliance.
Additional bedroom with a small balcony.
Cozy bedroom with private balcony space.
Small yet functional guest bedroom with a mini balcony.

openings.name: Balcony Access Doors
openings.description: Each bedroom has a door leading to an individual balcony.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Large windows in living and dining areas for natural light.

levels.vastu_note: North-facing entrance ensures positive energy entry. Bedrooms aligned with North or Northeast directions per Vastu for better sleep and mental well-being.
